attributes.action: Stop pushing for wind turbines against the wishes of the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you object to the government pushing wind turbines for power, please sign this petition

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop pushing for wind turbines against the wishes of the public."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15818.asp

Prime Minister's Office
